channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:15 Failure to alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 13:15 Failure to alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 13:14 Driven anxiety in the Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.

item.title: 游리 13:12 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 13:12 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
